title: 29.) Top 40 Countdown - How Do I Cope with My Mom's Death?
description:
Joan took care of her 92-year-old mother, and since her mother's death, Joan's daily routine has turned upside down. - Dr. Laura: "In time you'll adjust to the new rhythm of your life."
